column4: There is no such thing as "old set of ports that most computers wont recognize"
It might be a difference between the old and new AIM clients though.
Well there goes my theory ;)
What IM client are you using?
Any reasons for using such an old thing?
;) newest supported official Linux client
Why not, for example, Pidgin or Empathy?
Like the old basic interface better, Im not one for newer stuff, still a terminal addict as well
Hmm. Could you try sending something to me, for example?
sure
grawity@gmail.com, send anything random
?I can send email, just not "AIM File Transfer" ;)
Um, that is my AIM account :)
I do have an older one, just 'grawity', in case AIM doesn't accept that one.
ah, ok
Desi......Will send shortly
sending
Well, it seemed to work.
hmm and you use pidgin?
Yes
Interesting, well I'm stumped I have so far found no logical pattern in the transfer problems
